sourcesContent:
import { useEffect } from "react" import { useState } from "react" import { getCookie, removeCookie } from "../Cookie/Cookie" const Header = () => { const [id, setId] = useState('') const [nickName, setNickName] = useState('') const [isLogIn, setIsLogIn] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { setId(getCookie("key")) setNickName(getCookie("nickName")) getCookie("key") === undefined ? setIsLogIn(false) : setIsLogIn(true); }, []) const logOut = () => { removeCookie("key"); removeCookie("refreshToken"); removeCookie("accessToken"); window.location.reload(); } const logInButtonEvent = () => { window.location.href = "/logIn" } return (
{/*
*/}
Home

{/*

*/} { getCookie("key") === undefined ? <> Log In Sign Up : <> {`${getCookie("nickName")}(${getCookie("key")})`} }
Home
) } export default Header;
